body.name: K KNODEL Large Desk Mat, Office Desk Pad, Computer Desk Mat, Laptop Mat for Desk, Desk Protecor Mat, Desktop Mat, Desk Writing Pad, Desk Blotter Pad, Desk Cover Mat (31.5"x15.7", Dark Green)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 25 mins
features: PROTECT YOUR DESK Made of durable PU leather material, which protects your desk from scratches, stains, spills, heat and scuffs. It also gives your office a modern and professional atmosphere when you put it on your desktop. Its smooth surface will make you enjoy writing, typing and browsing. It is perfect for both office and home.

TOUGH DURABLE MATERIAL & DOUBLE-SIDED USE Made of premium PU leather material with durable construction, the Knodel desk pad protector will last for a long time. We designed it with the same material but with different colors on each side, and you can use both sides.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL DESK PAD Size 23.6" x 13.8" / 31.5" x 15.7" / 35.4" x 17", which is large enough to accommodate your laptop, mouse and keyboard. Its comfortable and smooth surface can be a mouse pad and a writing pad. Its non-slip material also adds stability during everyday use.
WATERPROOF & EASY TO CLEAN Water resistant and heat resistant material makes this product durable and easy to clean. If you want to clean it, simply wipe its surface with a wet cloth.

ONE YEAR WARRANTY We are dedicated to providing our customers with high quality products and superior service. All of our Knodel desk pads come with a one year warranty. If you are dissatisfied with our product, we can offer you a new one or 100% money back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sized pad for full keyboard on work station desk
reviews.reviewText: I needed something different than the traditional mouse pad. After searching for products it became evident that a better solution was a desk mat. I read many reviews of different pads and found this product to be the best quality for the best price. The pad feels very durable. It is cut material rather than stitched on the edges but it is obviously not going to fray. The pad doesn't slip with casual movement but it is easily moved. the pad provides about 6.5 inches on either side of my standard ten-key keyboard. The bad is soft also firm enough to be able to write on a sheet of paper on the pad without poking through. The few times I have spilled a few drops of a drink, the pad wiped up easily with nothing soaked in or stained. Great product with beautiful colors.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for your desk.
reviews.reviewText: I actually really like this addition to my desk! Durable. Cleans up well and looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have.
reviews.reviewText: I was reluctant to get this to begin with. However, I am very glad I purchased it as it is very nice looking and a durable product. It moves somewhat, but this problem is easily fixed with double sided tape which cannot be detected when installed. Works as designed. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Desk Mat!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase of these mats and I truly love them - they are well made, fit perfectly in the space they are needed and used, and they look beautiful! So much YES for the price, which is lower than its worth! If you are wondering whether to buy one, do it! You won't be sorry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleek desk pad with various colors and sizes
reviews.reviewText: I was in the market for a new mouse pad and after some research, decided on a a desk pad instead. In the end, I decided to choose this one because it matched my desktop. These desk pads are available in a variety of colors and sizes. It's sleek and my mouse works great on it. It is a little bigger than I had envisioned for my desk but that's on me and my lack of spacial awareness. The pad came rolled up so there were no creases in the mat. It did take a day of leaving heavy items on the corner to get the mat to lay flat. The only con is the thinness and lightness of the mat - it does slide around. Overall, I am happy with the purchase. I will be purchasing a smaller size in a different color for another desk.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pad for my desk
reviews.reviewText: I bought white... but I like it. These are actually larger than I thought, but perfect for my desk as my keyboard and mouse sit on it with plenty of room to spare. I really like the material and it looks fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great large keyboard/mousepad!
reviews.reviewText: Love the texture and feel of this. Its not suede, but its not the hard plasticky feel of other faux leathers out there. Feels more like leather with a synthetic feel to it. My major concern was how the pad flattened once unrolled, but upon receiving the box, I immediately laid it out and let it rest on top of a table flattened by books before installing it on my desk. All corners and side lie perfectly flat and looks great on my desk. It's not the grippiest but its fine to me. It helps to clean the bottom of the pad and the desk with alcohol for better grip if that's what you like. Cleans up easy too.

The media could not be loaded. This desk mat does not slide around, bend, or crinkle. Matter of fact, it seems to adhere nicely as if it was glued to my desk.I bought this, hoping it would prevent the dark varnish from rubbing off on my magic mouse and the braided material around the newer Apple device chargers and cables.So far, I have accidentally marked on it with ink from an uncapped pen, and was pleasantly surprised with how easily it wipes clean with 70% isopropyl alcohol or hand sanitizer dabbed onto a tissue.My only regret is that there isn’t a size in a rectangular shape that will cover the entire desk. Otherwise, it was a great price for a great product, and I would most definitely buy it again.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️/5.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein Hochwertiges Bürozubehör zu günstigem Preis
reviews.reviewText: Als ich meinen Heimarbeitsplatz neu gestaltet habe, stieß ich auf die Knodel Schreibtischunterlage durch die Empfehlung meiner Partnerin. Die Beschreibung versprach viel, und ich muss sagen: Sie hält jedes ihrer Versprechen.Wasserdicht und Robustheit: Der erste Eindruck war die Qualität des Materials ein widerstandsfähiges PVC, das sich als absolut wasserdicht erwies. Dies ist besonders praktisch, da mein Arbeitsplatz oft von Kaffeetassen und Wassergläsern bevölkert ist. Ein umgestoßenes Glas? Kein Problem mehr.Design und Komfort: Optisch ist die Unterlage mit ihrer doppelseitigen Farbgebung in Dunkelgrau und Schwarz ein echter Hingucker. Sie passt sich nahtlosan jede Raumgestaltung an. Ihre dünne Beschaffenheit macht sie zudem äußerst platzsparend. Beim Schreiben bietet sie einen angenehmen Untergrund, der sich auch bei längerem Arbeiten als sehr komfortabel erweist.Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis: Hier punktet die Knodel Unterlage mit einem unschlagbaren Angebot. Selten findet man eine Schreibtischunterlage, die so viel Qualität zu einem so fairen Preis bietet.Ein kleiner Kritikpunkt: Einziger Nachteil ist ihre Tendenz, auf sehr glatter Oberflächen etwas zu rutschen. Hier wäre vielleicht eine rutschfeste Unterseite hilfreich. Doch dieses kleine Manko fällt kaum ins Gewicht angesichts der vielen Vorteile.Fazit: Die Knodel Schreibtischunterlage ist ein hervorragendes Produkt für jeden, der seinen Arbeitsbereich funktional und stilvoll aufwerten möchte. Ich kann sie uneingeschränkt empfehlen.
